attributes.action: woman in raped in a Laos Prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It may well be that Samantha Orobator is guilty of an offence in Laos. But her rape and subsequent pregnancy is a violation of british human rights. I cant believe that you are actually going forward with this political suicide. Do not be seen to whitewash this. 

Deal with it as we expect of our Prime Minster. 

Surely you cant let this happen. I hope you are going to have firm words with the laos goverment. 

regards

Bernie McDonald

Just a bricklayer from Aberdeen

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
